column1: 141 kph delivery to start. Pace, bounce, carry. Short of a length outside off, Warner slaps a cut to cover. That should ease some nerves all around
138 kph, full and straight this time, not much swing. Not much movement. But the pace is there. Worked to square leg. Warner wanted one, Dhawan didn't. Still nervy out there with so much noise

Warner may not have had a great Test series against India, but he's right at home here, in the format, in this competition. Back of a length delivery outside off, Warner opens the bat face and guides the ball through point. Somehow finds the gap
good length outside off, Warner allows the ball to hit the bat, instead of going towards the ball. Hit to cover
yikes, wayward. 146 kph though. Drifts down leg. Jadhav, RCB's new keeper, fumbles the collection
145 kph, harrying Dhawan for pace. Full on leg, no swing. So when it hits Dhawan's pads, it looks like it's sliding down. It is
decent start from both sides. Good length on the thigh pad, Dhawan misses a flick. Off the body towards square leg for a leg bye
good length delivery outside off,  a hint of swing. Not much. Dhawan pushes towards mid-off and sets off for a single. A quality run. Intent matters, and adds a run too.

over mid-off. Sees a full delivery, and lets his hands through the line of the ball. The stroke was accentuated with width. Full and wide outside off, Warner bends his knees and lifts the ball over mid-off. Shot
the first no-ball of IPL 10. Full delivery on the pads, Warner misses a flick. Off the pad towards the keeper
that's the first six of IPL 10. Back of a length delivery outside off, Warner stays back. Picks the length early and swats a pull very high. But got elevation and distance

there's the first wicket of the season. It's all happening. A loose stroke by Warner. Full delivery outside off, there is some swing too. Warner lets his hands go through the line, an error because there is some movement. The ball skews off the outside half and carries to backward point, a reverse-cupped catch. Hard hands.
full delivery outside off, some swing back in. Dabbed away to gully. Good stuff from Choudhary
smashed for four. A good length delivery outside off, Henriques stays in his crease and cracks a cut through point. Too much width from the debutant
looking for a yorker. A full toss on middle and leg, worked to backward square leg for a run. Should have been two. There's one run that Sunrisers should have got that they didn't
lovely stroke. Back of a length outside off, Henriques scythes a cut towards backward point. Using the pace.
141 kph, full delivery, close to off stump. Henriques plays it down by his feet.
lovely stroke. Good length delivery on off, Henriques flicks his wrists and the ball through square leg. Played that discernibly late to get it that fine. A fumble allows the third
that's a poor ball. Back of a length down leg, Dhawan works the ball down to fine leg. Lovely stroke.
really good single. Full delivery outside off, pushed towards cover. Calls 'yeah, yeah, yeah' immediately and gets the run easily
nice. Pushed through on middle and leg, blocked
worked away through midwicket for a run. Just a tad too straight there
lovely. Flight on off, Dhawan presses forward to defend. A hint of turn too
worked away through midwicket for a single. Too straight again. But it's good defensive bowling in the Powerplay

nicely played. Flat delivery outside off, pushed to long-off for a run. Whoa, miscommunication. Henriques should have been out. The fielder eases in, and throws the ball to the keeper. Dhawan called yes, Henriques hurries down for the second, and gives up but returns quickly when he sees the throw is to the keeper
flicked to deep midwicket
good length delivery outside off, 129 kph, pushed towards cover. An easy run with so many fielders on the ring
pushed away towards mid-on for a single
a mow. Dhawan runs down and slaps a length delivery to mid-on. On the bounce. Binny fields, but there's a run
goes over the infield. Very intentional. Full delivery outside off, carved over extra cover for a couple
that's rubbish. Back of a length down leg, Henriques pulls and finds the boundary behind square. Easy pickings.
big appeal. A thick inside edge. Flat delivery on off, Henriques hits the ball into his body
starts off with a hip-high short ball on the leg stump, Dhawan happily swats it away through backward square leg
boom. Dhawan races down the track, takes it on a half-volley and simply belts a drive between Watson and Henriques. Drilled straight down the ground. 50 up in just 5.2 overs
Watson goes for the wide yorker outside off, cross-seam, Dhawan can only squeeze it back to Watson
Watson goes for the wide yorker again. The execution is bad. This is a full-toss outside off, Dhawan this time stretches forward and crunches it past the covers
chest-high short ball on middle and leg, fine leg is inside the circle, square leg is inside the circle. Dhawan rolls his wrists and pulls it away to the square leg boundary
really full and outside off, driven through the line for one. 17 runs off that over
dragged down short outside off, Dhawan sits back and pulls it along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, slides off the deck, no real turn. Negotiated on the back foot
full and straight on off, driven on the front foot to long-on
skids on outside off, chopped to backward point. There was no run there. Mills picks the ball up and throws it wildly well wide of Jadhav and concedes an extra run
chopped to the covers
tossed full and outside off, Dhawan stretches out and drives a single down to long-off
full and slides on off, Dhawan opens the bat-face and dabs it gently to point
fired on middle from around the wicket, Henriques punches a single to long-on
Dhawan uses his feet and drives a length ball to long-on running in
speared across off, 91ks, Henriques forays down the track, gets close to the pitch, and launches it with great authority over long-on
another one that slides across off stump, this is shorter, cut away to Mills at backward point
tossed up on the pads, Dhawan sits back and works it in the gap at midwicket
Dhawan steps out early, Chahal lobbed it really wide outside off. Asks Dhawan to reach out. He can only toe-end it over a leaping cover fielder
short on the leg stump, swatted away to deep square leg
tossed full on middle, driven to long-on
looks like a googly outside off, Dhawan swats it away to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off again, slashed away to deep point
fired outside off, forced away in the direction of long-on. Head runs across from deep midwicket, takes his eyes off the ball, and lets it through his hands for an extra run
Dhawan advances down the track, aiming for a pull over midwicket, this is dug in shorter, and bounces over the leg stump
full and wide outside off, nearly 140ks, Dhawan forces a single to the off-side sweeper
short of a length on middle and leg, Aniket hits 140ks, Henriques sits back and clips it away to midwicket

Dhawan skies a pull and gets away. Short of a length and outside off, Aniket hustles the batsman for pace. Hits the splice as Dhawan pulls. Watson follows the ball from mid-off, does not really attack the ball, midwicket moves to his right. But the ball lands in between them
overpitched on leg stump, picked off square of long leg
banged in short and outside off, Dhawan has a slash at the ball and misses. Jadhav can't collect the ball cleanly
half-tracker outside off, pulled away to wide long-on
slower length ball outside off, Dhawan goes down on one knee, picks it up and laps it away square of short fine leg

Dhawan can't clear long-on! Dhawan uses his feet and looks to slug a length ball from outside off over the long-on boundary. He isn't really a big six-hitter down the ground. He can't get enough power and distance. Holes out to Baby
good length and floated in on off, tapped down to long-on
just short of a good length and outside off, Yuvraj opens the face and glides it through backward point
Binny rolls his fingers across this slower offcutter, Yuvraj waits on it before opening his face and running it down to deep third man
length and angled across off, run down to third man
good length on off, dabbed to backward point with soft hands
good length cutter outside off, Yuvraj waits for the ball to arrive, then glides it down to third man
short and wide outside off, flashed away to square third man
this is a Yuvraj special. Back of a length and just outside off, picks it up and whips it with the wrists over midwicket
length and outside off, helped down to third man again
short of a length and outside off, Yuvraj attempts a pull and ends up inside-edging past the leg stump. Rolls away fine on the leg side. Aniket can be skiddy
this is vintage Yuvraj, just driving through the line. Full and outside off, Yuvraj opens up his arms and lofts it over extra cover
poor bowling. Hip-high short ball outside off, Yuvraj camps back and nails a pull over midwicket for back-to-back boundaries
much better. 134ks banged short and flies through to the keeper. Yuvraj lets it pass
really full and wide outside off, makes a mess of the wide yorker and goes too wide. Off-side wide. Jadhav does not look comfortable behind the stumps
back of a length and outside off, crisply cut away square of Mills at deep third man

Dropped! Aravind shells it at deep square leg. Aniket ventures shorter and outside off, Yuvraj does not shy away from the pull. He hits it well enough, does not get enough distance on it, but gets away. Aravind makes a mess of a regulation chest-high catch. He attempted a reverse cup, the ball hit his chest, and went down
hip-high short ball outside off, got to get the ball up higher, Yuvraj picks it up and stylishly picks it up over midwicket
full and wide outside off, throws his bat at the ball and edges it to third man
full and straight, clipped through midwicket
Yuvraj, standing on off stump, moves across off further, meets a full-toss on a fifth-stump line, and whips past midwicket
change-up. Slower and wider outside off, Henriques reaches out but can't touch the ball
really full on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on for one
Henriques jumps down the track, Aravind goes shorter and outside off, slapped away to the right of Chahal at sweeper cover
back of a length on the leg stump, worked to square leg

Yuvraj launches another one into the stands. If you want to bowl short, you have to target the badge. This is a hip-high short ball outside off, possibly a slower one, picked up and pulled over midwicket
another hip-high short ball just outside off, stylishly whipped to deep square leg
just short of a good length on off, another slower ball, this one sits up. Henriques picks it up and dumps it over midwicket
full-toss on middle and leg, misses the yorker, punched to the midwicket region
a flat delivery on off from Chahal, pushed back

taken at the boundary. Full delivery on off, Henriques runs down, but doesn't quite get to the pitch. He goes through with the stroke, and gets more elevation than distance. It goes straight up. Long-off takes a good catch at the boundary. A reverse-cupped catch. They're having a look at the no-ball, but he's fine. Just!
what? how? It's happened again. A googly on middle, Yuvraj looks to pull but gets a leading edge which plonks near cover. Watson labours towards it. Safe. Another life for Yuvraj
worked away to deep midwicket

oh, fantastic stuff from Mandeep. A flat delivery outside off, so wide would have been called had Yuvraj let that go. But he goes after it. Yuvraj lays into a lofted drive towards long-off. Mandeep runs to his right, and puts in a leaping, diving, one-handed effort. The ball just bounces out of his hands as Mandeep is mid-air. Five runs saved. Didn't look to save the runs, wanted the catch. Fantastic stuff.
clipped through square leg for a run
good length outside off, dabbed away to third man
beaten for pace. Superb from Mills. Back of a length and close enough to off stump. Yuvraj misses his dab to third man
four more. A bouncer on off, Yuvraj pulls, doesn't keep it down, but hammers the pull into the gap in front of square
there is that slower ball. Good length outside off, slapped to cover for a run
flummoxes Hooda. The slower bouncer, back of the hand. Hooda thinks it's pacey, but it isn't. Ducks underneath.
another slower variation to end the over. Good length outside off, dabbed towards point

parried for six. RCB's woes continue. A slower ball on middle, Hooda swings. High in the air, Chahal moves back slowly, conscious of the boundary. In the end, he reverse-cups the parry over the boundary
over point for a run. A full toss on off, Hooda's slog skews to deep point
full and very wide outside off, called
another wide called. Full and excessively wide outside off. Outside the tramline, called
sliced over point for four. Yuvraj makes fifty. Off 23 balls. His fastest in IPL. Full and wide from Choudhary, not a bad area to bowl actually. But then why isn't the sweeper finer, towards point
full and wide again, carved to deep point on the bounce. The fielder is a lot finer now
excellent bouncer. Back of a length on leg, Hooda, beaten for pace, gloves his pull over the keeper for a couple. Good change in length

went right across. Went behind the stumps too outside off. Choudhary misses an opportunity by not bowling that full and straight. Hooda flicks to deep midwicket. Probably did that to convert a yorker into a full length
another back of the hand slower bouncer. Hooda is beaten, but then so slow is the ball that he pulls to deep square leg. Good improvisation
lovely shot. Full and straight, all pace. Yuvraj was setting himself for the slower ball and was prepared to improvise if the ball was quick. It was and he did well. Just a flick past short fine leg
that sits up for Yuvraj. A back of the hand slower ball that is bowled short. Yuvraj picks the length and boom. Swatted over square leg. A lovely sound off the bat

bowled this time. And Mills is pumped. 143 kph. That is quite an ideal delivery. Good length on middle, not full, not short. That indecisive length. Yuvraj looks to hit that through midwicket but fails to connect. Beaten for pace too. Clips the top of the bail on leg and middle. A spectacular effort from Yuvraj.
a length delivery on middle, pulled to long-on for a run. Nice length again.
good end from Mills. Considering the damage, this hasn't been a bad debut from Mills. Length on leg, Hooda wants one to third man but fails to connect
full and wide, well bowled. A thick outside edge to third man for a run. Good options from Watson. Takes the six over square leg/midwicket out
excellent bowling. 133 kph, extremely wide. Hooda reaches out and guides a run to point
all power. Full and wide outside off, Cutting stays in his crease and lofts the ball nonchalantly over deep cover. So much power behind that stroke
a low full toss this time, hit over the bowler for a couple. Superb ball-striking off some pretty good bowling
a bouncer. A nice change in length. Cutting ducks underneath
huuuge! Length delivery on off, sits up for Cutting. Hammered over square leg for six. Can't bowl that length with medium pace.
full outswinger outside off, Gayle opens the face and guides the ball down to third man for one
back of a length and angling away just outside off, 141ks, Mandeep is hurried onto an off-side drive. Ends up skewing the ball through mid-on
back of a length and outside off, no lateral movement, Mandeep flays it straight to extra cover
short on off, Mandeep sits back and shovels it away to the right of mid-on
full on middle, right in the hitting slot, Mandeep opens up his hips and swings it over midwicket. The fielder in the deep was squarer
back of a length and angling across off, Mandeep reaches out and punches it serenely past backward point. Beats square third man running to his right as well
full and angling away outside off, Gayle has a leaden-footed swish and only connects with thin air
full on middle, Gayle stays back and pushes to off
good length and angling away outside off, Gayle opens the face and steers it through point
full and outside off, Mandeep is nowhere near the pitch as he mis-times a drive back to the bowler
full on off, defended back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, flashed away to point
length ball, swings in, Gayle has a big swing at it and does not make contact
hip-high ball on the leg stump, swivels on the back foot and helps it away to the right of short fine leg
another hip-high short ball outside off, Gayle swats it away to deep square leg
full on middle and leg, Mandeep swings it nice and clear over wide mid-on
really full and wide outside off, squeezed down to third man
Gayle gets into his groove. Length ball outside off, Gayle extends his arms, and lofts it disdainfully over the long-on boundary. Sends it soaring into the stands
Mandeep skips out and drags an inside edge through square leg. He wasn't close to the pitch
pitched up on off stump, Gayle lays into it, putting Bhuvneshwar over the long-on fence with a clean, powerful swing
short on leg stump, Gayle was sitting back for it, tucking to deep square leg
full-toss wide outside off, left alone. Too wide that it's called a wide
good length on middle, Gayle pokes it to the covers
slower offcutter from Bhuvneshwar, 115ks, Gayle waits for it to arrive and gently pats it down the ground
142ks, full from Bhuvneshwar, too full, a fierce whirl of the wrists from Mandeep sends the ball to the wide long-on boundary
begins with a bouncer on the leg stump, aimed at the head, Gayle ducks under it
change-up, slower cutter, 118ks, Gayle was already through with the slog. Beaten for the change of pace
just short of a good length and outside off, Gayle hangs back and flat-bats it to mid-of
another slower one. Really full and cuts away wide outside off. Gayle throws his bat at it but can't reach it. Wide
back of a length and outside off, Gayle has a big mow to leg. He can't connect
short and outside off, Gayle makes some room and flays the ball to cover
length and outside off, Gayle has a leg-side slog and ends up dragging an inside edge over midwicket. An excellent over, nevertheless
full and slides on outside off, Mandeep backs away and shovel-drives it like Kohli to extra cover
too full and outside off,  Mandeep backs away and shovel-drives it again, this time he finds the gap at cover and the boundary
darted short and outside off, chopped to cover

Rashid strikes in his first over in the IPL. Googly? No, this is the quicker one, that skids off the deck. Mandeep plays back, is fooled by the trajectory, and drags an inside edge back onto the leg stump
short on off, worked to leg on the back foot
very full and outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
darted outside off, chopped to cover
this is a massive, massive blow from Gayle. Full-toss outside off,  Gayle stretches forward and smites it into the night sky

six and out! The offspinner takes down Gayle. Length ball outside off, this does not turn much. Gayle steps out, aims for an encore. He miscues this. Warner runs to his right from long-off and pouches it well. He lets out a big roar
full and outside off, pushed to cover
full and outside off, driven down the ground
good dip for Hooda, Jadhav eyes up the leg side, and ends up leading-edging the ball towards mid-off
full and sliding across off, Head thumps a drive to the left of a diving extra cover
whipped away between wide long-on and deep midwicket
pitched up and outside off, driven down to long-off
googly, spins in, inside-edged to midwicket
short legbreak on the leg stump, Head hangs back and clips it away to deep square leg
rank long hop outside off, nearly 100ks, Jadhav camps back and pulls it powerfully to the midwicket boundary. Duly put away
short of a length and outside off, whipped on the back foot through midwicket
leg-side wide
short and outside off, Jadhav goes hard on the ball and flat-bats it to mid-off
skiddy short ball on off, hurriedly pulled to long leg
short of a length and outside off, Head slashes a cut to the right of sweeper cover
short ball, you've got to get it up higher. This hip-high ball sits up, Jadhav pulls and puts Cutting over the midwicket boundary
back of a length legcutter outside off, punched down the ground
full-toss above the waist, clipped around the corner, no-ball
full offcutter outside off, Head picks it , waits for the ball to arrive, and smashes it straight of wide long-on
back of a length on off, punched down to long-on
short of a length and outside off, cut away firmly to deep point
slower offcutter outside off, 114ks, Head does not pick this. Swishing and missing early
really full on off, drilled back to the bowler, who lets it bursts through his hands in his followthrough
This smashed back to the bowler's right. Kedhar steps out, this is shorter, drilled in the air, it was too quick for Henriques
Head shimmies out, and whips a full-toss to Dhawan at deep square leg
Jadhav shuffles across off, Nehra bowls it on a fourth-stump on the leg side. Wide called
tucked off the pads to square leg
full-toss on off stump, picked up, and whipped away to deep square leg
full-toss outside off, Jadhav brings his quick hands into play, smearing it over midwicket
hip-high short ball on the leg stump, with short fine leg inside the circle, this is helped square of Hooda there
short on leg stump again, Hooda had been moved to the deep before this ball, pulled to long leg
good length and outside off, shimmies out and runs it to point
short on off, stands tall and forces it to wide long-on
just short of a good length and outside off, slogged away off the inside half to deep square leg

Ripping throw from Cutting. He effects a direct hit on the full, nailing the top of the stumps at the striker's end from long leg. Kedhar premeditated a lap sweep. He went low, took a length ball from outside off and lapped it away to long leg. Cutting swoops down on the ball and splatters the stumps. What a throw - full-toss hitting the stumps from the deep - to catch the batsman miles short on the second
short and outside off, stands tall and punches to sweeper
short and outside off, flashed to point
fired outside off, driven to long-off
tossed outside off, driven on the front foot to wide long-off for two
flighted outside off, driven down to long-on
Rashid loses his length. Full-toss on the middle stump, Head goes down on one knee and slogs it powerfully over midwicket. One-bounce four
Rashid Khan comes back and strikes. This is the wrong'un outside off, Head hits against the turn and miscues this slog. The ball drops into the hands of long-on
ooh. Flat delivery outside off, some turn, some bounce. Beats the outside edge
flat delivery on the pads, Baby misses a flick. Struck on the pad
shortish on off, hammered to long-off
pushed through, it's a good length, but Watson is very strong on the pull. Hit to deep square leg

taken. Bipul gets one. Henriques takes the catch. RCB falling away rapidly. A flat, full delivery on the pads. Baby wanted to hit that over midwicket, but the ball slid on with the arm, resulting in a leading edge which hung in the air. Henriques back-tracks and takes a simple catch, made that look easy
punched to long-on from the back foot. Tidy over so far
worked away through square leg for a run. Good stuff from Bipul
nudged to square leg for one. Excellent length. Ensuring it's tough to hit
a googly, worked away through midwicket
the googly, Binny doesn't read it off the pitch or in the air. Convincingly undone. Hits Binny on the pad

just outside off. Flat delivery outside off, Binny didn't pick the previous one, so the obvious reaction was the sweep. Rashid knew that so he fired it full. Gets underneath Binny's sweep. Big appeal, impact outside off
cut to short third man, googly
brute power. Back of a length on middle, can't drop short to Watson. He rocks back and pummels a pull over long-on. So strong. Muscle was enough, Add timing and the result is pretty clear
a legcutter outside off. Sprayed wide outside off intentionally. Creeps underneath the bat
got that alright. This one is straighter. Binny stays in the crease and thwack. Waaay over midwicket. Timing again

what was that? Short third man backtracked instead of coming forward. That should have been taken. Complete misjudgement. Back of a length, Binny looks to dab the ball over short third man, but can only lob it towards the fielder. Absurd. Never seen that before. A regulation catch if he went forward or even sideways.
a slow legcutter outside off, driven up to mid-off. Watson sends Binny back
through cover. Henriques at cover dives over the ball. Full and wide outside off, Watson cracks a lovely cover drive along the ground.
a low full toss on leg, clipped to deep midwicket for one
a nice yorker outside off, hit up to long-off for a run

oh phew. Naman Ojha has shelled a sitter. The fielding in this game has been appalling. A slower delivery outside off, Binny's slog results in a leading edge which hangs in the air for quite a bit. Naman shuns everyone away. But gets underneath it and lets it go through
an excellent wide yorker. Just inside the tramline
another wide yorker, outside-edged down to third man for a run

this is an easier opportunity and taken. This is lovely bowling. It's a length legcutter on off. The legcutter has some skid, some pace. Binny is hurried on his pull and just bunts a catch to Yuvraj at backward point.
full delivery outside off, a swing across the line makes connection with nothing but air.
doesn't look quick. A low full toss on middle and leg, swept away to deep square leg. Watson labours back for two
there it is. Turns down the single. A full delivery down leg, Watson misses a sweep. Off the pad towards midwicket

that's the game. A full toss on middle and off, the ball moves away in the air. Watson cannot time his heave. Gets a leading edge which hangs in the air for a bit before settling in midwicket's reverse-cupped hands. Simple.
bowled. Clean through. Araving gives himself room, but Nehra is full and straight. Smashes into leg stump. Zing bails go everywhere. Nehra gets to 100 IPL wickets
ooh, just past the outside edge. Full and wide outside off, Chahal is beaten on the outside edge
and again. Full and wide, Chahal plays a drive too early and is beaten. Two wickets for Nehra in his spell
fullish on the middle and leg stumps, looked like a thick inside edge into the pad for a run towards third man
full and straight, defended to mid-off
slower ball, nudged down to fine leg for a single
smashed for six. Full and wide outside off, Mills unleashes a square drive over point. Way into the stands, Surely a better No. 8 than Aravind
very very high in the air, and Warner takes it. A slower delivery on middle and leg, Tymal Mills gets underneath the mow. Soars high, Warner settles underneath and claims the catch.
legcutter on middle, worked to midwicket. A couple of wickets for Bhuvi too, does his job
good length delivery outside off, pushed away towards point.
good length delivery on middle, pulled towards midwicket. The fielder gets across and misses the stumps at the bowler's end. Out if he hit.
nice way to start your IPL batting career. A bouncer on leg, Choudhary gets a thick top-edge which flies over fine leg for six.

Chris Jordan makes his appearance in the IPL. A slower short delivery on middle, pulled on the bounce to Jordan at midwicket. He picks up cleanly, and throws the stumps down at the bowler's end as Choudhary sent Chahal back. It's RCB's worst loss - in terms of runs - since April 2013. Not the best way to start the season
